Uses of Class
com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations.OperationResult

  • Packages that use OperationResult 
    Package Description
    com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations
    Interfaces to implement to implement user exits (costom functionality) for a IDD application.

    • Uses of OperationResult in com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations

      Subclasses of OperationResult in com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AfterOpenOperationResult
      Defines a result that is returned from the following user exit IOpenOperationPlugin.afterOpen(com.siperian.bdd.userexits.datamodel.BDDObject).
      class  HMOperationResult
      Defines a result that is returned from the following user exit IHMUserOperationPlugin.
      Fields in com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations declared as OperationResult 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static OperationResult ISaveOperationPlugin.NEED_REFRESH_OBJECT
      Value that can be returned by AfterEverything method to inform IDD that objects passed to the method were modified and neeed to be reloaded.
      static OperationResult OperationResult.OK
      Object that should be returned in case errors absence during user code execution.
      Methods in com.siperian.bdd.userexits.operations that return OperationResult 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OperationResult ISaveOperationPlugin.afterEverything(BDDObject savingObject)
      Called when BDD has successfully persisted data associated with Composite Save operation and successfully committed database transaction.
      OperationResult IMergeOperationPlugin.afterEverything(BDDObject mergeTarget, List<BDDObject> sourceRecords)
      Called when BDD has successfully merged records and successfully committed database transaction.
      OperationResult IMarkNotAMatchOperationPlugin.afterEverything(BDDObject notAMatchTarget, List<BDDObject> recordsToUnmatch)
      Called when BDD has successfully removed corresponding records from [BO]_MTCH table and successfully committed database transaction.
      OperationResult IHMRelationshipSaveOperationPlugin.afterEverything(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when one of the following HM relationship related operations are ended: edit create delete (end-date relationship) The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification.
      OperationResult IMarkNotAMatchOperationPlugin.afterMarkNotAMatch(BDDObject mergeTarget, List<BDDObject> recordsToMark)
      Called when BDD has successfully removed corresponding records from [BO]_MTCH table but database transaction is not yet committed.
      OperationResult IMergeOperationPlugin.afterMerge(BDDObject mergeTarget, List<BDDObject> sourceRecords)
      Called when BDD has successfully persisted data associated with Merge operation but database transaction is not yet committed.
      OperationResult ISaveOperationPlugin.afterSave(BDDObject savedObject)
      Called when BDD has successfully persisted data associated with Composite Save operation but database transaction is not yet committed, so it is possible to rollback all changes.
      OperationResult IHMRelationshipSaveOperationPlugin.afterSave(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when one of the following HM relationship related operations are ended: edit create delete (end-date relationship) The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification.
      OperationResult IHMRelationshipSaveOperationPlugin.afterValidation(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when the validation is done prior to the following HM relationship related operations: edit create The code implementing this method operates with read-only data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification.
      OperationResult ISaveOperationPlugin.beforeEverything(BDDObject savingObject)
      Called before the Composite Save operation is started.
      OperationResult IMergeOperationPlugin.beforeEverything(BDDObject mergeTarget, List<BDDObject> sourceRecords)
      Called before the Merge operation is started.
      OperationResult IMarkNotAMatchOperationPlugin.beforeEverything(BDDObject notAMatchTarget, List<BDDObject> recordsToUnmatch)
      Called before the Mark Not A Match operation is started.
      OperationResult IHMRelationshipSaveOperationPlugin.beforeEverything(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when the validation is about to be started prior to the following HM relationship related operations: edit create delete (end-date relationship)
      OperationResult IMarkNotAMatchOperationPlugin.beforeMarkNotAMatch(BDDObject mergeTarget, List<BDDObject> recordsToMark)
      Called when BDD starts to remove records from [BO]_MTCH table.
      OperationResult IMergeOperationPlugin.beforeMerge(BDDObject mergeTarget, List<BDDObject> sourceRecords)
      Called when BDD starts to persist data as part of Merge operation.
      OperationResult IOpenOperationPlugin.beforeOpen(CustomizableBDDObject object)
      Gets called before a data view tab is opened.
      OperationResult ISaveOperationPlugin.beforeSave(BDDObject savingObject)
      Called when BDD starts to persist data as part of Composite Save operation.
      OperationResult IHMRelationshipSaveOperationPlugin.beforeSave(List<BDDHMRelationship> savingObjects)
      Operation is being executed by BDD when one of the following HM relationship related operations are about to start but when validation is already processed: edit create delete (end-date relationship) The code implementing this method operates with modifiable data BDDHMRelationship and can perform data verification.
      OperationResult IUserOperationPlugin.processOperation(BDDObject object)
      Called when the user selects an action from "More actions" menu.
